title: Frida Baby Control The Flow Bath Rinse Cup | Rinser Cup to Wash Hair + Body | Rinser Cup for Bath Time with Easy Grip Handle + Removable Rain Shower
features: MANY WAYS TO RINSE: Our bath rinse cup has multiple ways to rinse your little one's body and hair to protect both eyes and ears.
MULTIPLE POURING OPTIONS: Featuring a dual pour design, it offers a gentle rain shower for newborns and a refreshing waterfall for toddlers, catering to the specific needs of different age groups.
AMPLE CAPACITY: The bath rinser cup boasts a generous capacity of 710ml, allowing for extensive water storage and prolonged rinsing in a single pour, enhancing convenience and fun during bathing.
DUAL GRIP DESIGN: Equipped with both a handle and an ergonomic grip, this toddler and baby bath cup offers two convenient ways to pour, ensuring ease of use and comfortable handling for caregivers.
PERFECT PAIR: Combine with our Frida Baby Soft Sink Baby Bath for newborns and infants for all your baby bath essential needs and a complete bath time solution.
description: Rinse the day off of your little one with the Frida Baby Control the Flow Rinser. This dual flow baby bath cup features a soft rain shower spout that's gentle enough for newborns, and a waterfall spout to rinse off toddlers. The soft pitcher directs the flow of water out of their eyes and ears for a painless tub experience and makes it easier to rinse your little ones hair
